THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU!!!!!! GREAT MOVIE!!!  I HAD BEEN LOOKING FOR IT FOREVER!
Thanks for making it possible for me to rediscover this powerful film. The best thing Diane Keaton ever did, hands down. Made me appreciate her more as an actress.

I cannot understand why so many people have given a negative quality vote for this torrent. This rip is as perfect as it's possible for such an old film. The quality vote here should be for TECHNICAL quality, and not for whether or not you LIKE the film. The liking kan be voted on Imdb. After all, you have to have SEEN a film to know if you liked it.
Thank you, I've been looking for this for years.
